isp_info.isp_name: < Izina rya ISP > - utanga serivisi z'Interneti
isp_info.isp_address: Amazina y'umuhanda 10, umujyi n'ikodi yaho, n'ibindi.

pagetitle: Sisitemu yo kwinjira | < Izina rya ISP >
inputUsername_placeholder: -- ushobora kwitondera inyuguti nkuru n'intoya mu izina ry'umukoresha --
inputPassword_placeholder: -- ushobora kwitondera inyuguti nkuru n'intoya mu ijambo ry'ibanga --
anon_pretext1: Kugira ngo igikoresho cyawe kibone Interneti, kanda Injira. Uruhushya rwo gukoresha Interneti ruzakomeza gukurikira iminota 12 y'ikubitiro y'ubutagaragara kuri iki gikoresho.
status_pretext1: Igikoresho cyawe cyamaze kubona Interneti. Uruhushya rwo gukoresha ruzaguma rukurikire igihe cyagenwe hakurikijwe uko iki gikoresho gikora.
status_pretext2: Niba wifuza guhagarika iyi sesiyo ku bushake bwawe, kanda **SOHOKA**.
noscript: Iburira: Kugira ngo winjire neza muri sisitemu, JavaScript igomba kuba yemejwe muri mushakisho wawe.
cp_portal_info: Kugira ngo ubone Interneti kuri <Izina rya ISP>, usabwa izina ry’umukoresha n'ijambo ry'ibanga. Ni ngombwa kubirinda kubura cyangwa kugera mu maboko y'abandi batabyemerewe.
cp_portal_cookies_note: Sisitemu yo kwinjira ikoreshwa n'amakuru abikwa kuri mudasobwa yawe (cookies). Ikoreshwa mu kugirango ugirwe serivisi nziza kurushaho zijyanye n'ibyo ukeneye. Gukomeza gukoresha iyi poritayi utahinduye uburyo bwa cookies bivuze ko zizakomeza kubikwa ku gikoresho cyawe.
cp_session_timeout_content:
Igihe cyemewe cyo gukoresha interneti cyarenze, bityo ihuzanzira ryahagaritswe.
Wakora iki?
  • Kugira ngo ukomeze gukoresha interneti, reba niba bishoboka kongera igihe cyangwa kugura andi masaha y’ukoresha.
  • Niba ufite ibibazo, ushobora kuvugana n abashinzwe serivisi za tekiniki.
cp_error_login_err: Izina ry’umukoresha cyangwa ijambo ry’ibanga si byo
cp_error_server_connection: Ntibishobotse kwihuza na seriveri yemeza konti
cp_error_info:
• Habaye ikibazo mu kwandika izina ry’umukoresha cyangwa ijambo ry’ibanga
  • Ushobora kuba ufite Caps Lock wacanye
  • Hari ikindi gikoresho cyinjiye kuri konti yawe
  • Konti yawe ishobora kuba yahagaritswe bitewe n’imikorere itari yo y’igikoresho cyawe
  • Igihe cya konti cyashojwe cyangwa konti ikaba yarasibwe kubera kutishyura amafaranga y’abonema
cp_error_solution_title: Gerageza gukemura ikibazo hakurikijwe ibi bikurikira:
cp_error_solution:
• reba neza niba wandika izina ry’umukoresha n'ijambo ry’ibanga mu buryo bukwiye (witondere inyuguti nkuru n’intoya)
  • reba niba koko wishyuye abonema ya konti
  • Niba ikibazo kidahuye n'ibisubizo biri hejuru, hamagara abashinzwe imiyoborere y’urubuga
cp_rules_content:
1. Amabwiriza yanditse mu buryo bwa HTML isanzwe

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Proin nibh augue, suscipit a, scelerisque sed, lacinia in, mi. Cras vel lorem. Etiam pellentesque aliquet tellus. Phasellus pharetra nulla ac diam. Quisque semper justo at risus. Donec venenatis, turpis vel hendrerit interdum, dui ligula ultricies purus, sed posuere libero dui id orci. Nam congue, pede vitae dapibus aliquet, elit magna vulputate arcu, vel tempus metus leo non est. Etiam sit amet lectus quis est congue mollis. Phasellus congue lacus eget neque. Phasellus ornare, ante vitae consectetuer consequat, purus sapien ultricies dolor, et mollis pede metus eget nisi. Praesent sodales velit quis augue. Cras suscipit, urna at aliquam rhoncus, urna quam viverra nisi, in interdum massa nibh nec erat.
cp_login_attempt_content: Sisitemu yemera ko winjira nabi inshuro %s. Iyo uwo mubare urengewe, kwinjira birahagarikwa mu gihe kingana na %s %s.
a11y-keys_data-content:
Gukoresha imfunguzo
⇧ Shift (ibumoso)
+ ⌥ Alt (ibumoso)
+ inyuguti

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + U
fokus kuri akazu y'izina ry'umukoresha

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + P
fokus kuri akazu y’ijambo ry'ibanga

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + A
yemeza / ihakana akazu "Ndemeranya n'amabwiriza"

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + R
ifungura idirishya ry'amabwiriza

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + I
kwinjira mu sisitemu

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + O
gusohoka mu sisitemu

⇧ Shift + ⌥ Alt + L
gutangiza ihinduraburimi
a11y-lang-keys_data-content:
Kanda ⇧ Shift (ibumoso) hanyuma ukande inyuguti ebyiri z’urutonde rw’ururimi (ISO 639-1) icyarimwe cyangwa imwe inyuma y’indi.

Urugero:
⇧ Shift + P + L → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Igipolandi (pl)

⇧ Shift + E + N → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Icyongereza (en)

⇧ Shift + D + E → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Ikidage (de)

⇧ Shift + F + R → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Igifaransa (fr)

⇧ Shift + E + S → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Icyesipanyolo (es)

⇧ Shift + I + T → guhindura ku rurimi rw’Icyitaliyani (it)
...
polyglotLanguageSwitcher_data-content: Hano ushobora guhindura ururimi rw’uru rubuga. Ukanda kuri %s ku kibaho bizafungura agasanduku ka %s cyangwa Shift hamwe n’inyuguti ebyiri z’urutonde rw’ururimi icyarimwe cyangwa imwe inyuma y’indi nko: Shift + P + L guhindura ku rurimi watanze.
fieldUsername_data-content: Uru rubuga rufite urufunguzo rwo kwinjira. Ukanda icyarimwe kuri %s uzashyiraho urwo rubuga %s.
fieldPassword_data-content: Uru rubuga rufite urufunguzo rwo kwinjira. Ukanda icyarimwe kuri %s uzashyiraho urwo rubuga %s.
login-rules_data-content: Hano uzemeza ko wemeye amabwiriza yo gukoresha internet yatanzwe mu mabwiriza.
rules_data-content: Kanda kuri "Amabwiriza" kugirango usome ibikubiye mu mabwiriza.
cp_portal_event_undefined_data-content: Hano uzabona amakuru y’ukuntu igikoresho cyawe gihujwe.
signin_data-content: Kanda kuri Kwinjira kugirango utangize uburyo bwo gukoresha internet.
signin_anon_data-content: Kanda kuri Kwinjira kugirango utangize uburyo bwo gukoresha internet.
logoff_data-content: Kanda kuri Gusohoka kugirango usoze guhuza igikoresho cyawe na internet.
